channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Olympic & Paralympic Committee fires coach and director after investigation reveals one of their teenage athletes was sexually abused for years
item.description: Gary Colliander and Eileen Carey are no longer affiliated with the USOPC.

item.title: A new wildfire prediction AI model shows why data rules
item.description: Europe's leading weather forecaster ECMEF shows that adding additional data improves wildfire predictions, and that data trumps AI model complexity.

item.title: ‘Oh really? Oh s—.’ CEO reacts live to tariff-based stock plunge on earnings call
item.description: Company formerly known as Restoration Hardware flirts with 52-week low.

item.title: The NHL just struck a $7.7 billion deal with Rogers, which is more than double the previous media-rights contract they signed a decade ago
item.description: Rogers will have NHL rights through the 2037-38 season.

item.title: The Dow is down 1,500 points — yet 8 of its 30 components are ringing up gains
Crude-oil futures drop 7% as tariffs are forecast to curtail demand
S&P 500 opens at its lowest level since September as Trump tariffs roil markets
Number of Americans collecting unemployment benefits now highest since 2021
U.S. trade gap narrowed in February as tariff-racing import surge eased
Here’s why some companies have publicly defended their DEI commitment while others have scrapped their policies
item.description: The corporate DEI rollback is in full swing, but not everyone is taking part.
